name: Dustin Wata
description: Graduating BSCS student with experience in Backend and Cloud Development

projects.title: Pageant Scoring System
projects.description: Automated pageant scoring system for Hiyas ng NDDU using PHP and JSON, streamlining judge evaluations and real-time results calculation for seamless competition management.

projects.title: Automated Content Labeling and Filtering
projects.description: This project automates image filtering and labeling using AWS services (S3, Lambda, Step Functions, Rekognition, DynamoDB), with NSFW detection triggering notifications and deletion, and safe content tagged and stored.

projects.title: How this website is made
projects.description: Cloud Resume Challenge - A hands-on project showcasing cloud technologies to deploy a fully serverless website, complete with an automated CI/CD pipeline for seamless updates.

experience.company: Local Government Unit of General Santos City
experience.description: Designed and implemented backend web solution using PHP and SQL for automating cheque printing work of City Treasurer's Office and providing comprehensive summary about the printed cheques at the end of each month and year, improving the efficiency of cheque printing by reducing task completion time from a full workday to just 2 hours.
